name: Honest Dan's Last Stand
description:
Puzzle meets Tower Defence!?

Honest Dan's Last Stand is a tile matching puzzle game, where matching the correct tiles will aid you in the defence of your base. Keep your base intact for as long as possible against hordes of enemies. Complete the puzzle to help protect your base defences... and use your base defences to help you complete the puzzle! How long will you survive?

Streaming the entire development on Twitch

Visit [my twitch channel](https://www.twitch.tv/honestdangames) to watch my daily struggles as I work on the game. I am currently learning to developing games full-time, so you're likely to catch me streaming most days, most hours!
